name: GP Elements Admin Link
author: West Coast Digital

sections.description: This plugin adds a button to the admin bar to easily jump straight into Elements, add new Elements or duplicate existing Elements.
sections.installation: Ensure you have GeneratePress Premium Plugin installed and active
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without GeneratePress Premium?

No. Elements is a part of GeneratePress\’ Premium Plugin

Where can I buy a copy of GeneratePress Premium?

You can purchase GeneratePress\’ Premium Plugin here

Can I get GeneratePress Premium for free?

No. The premium plugin is a valuable asset that takes time to maintain and update, the author does an amazing job with support and functionality.
It is worth every cent.
sections.changelog:
1.4.3

  • Fixed an error with missing function causing the site to crash

1.4.2

  • Added primary link to link to main Elements post screen as requested by reelism

1.4.1

  • Stopped plugin firing if Elements is not active

1.4

  • Added ability to duplicate Elements

short_description: This plugin adds a button to the admin bar to easily jump straight into Elements or add new Elements
